name: Senator
description: Responsible for representing the state in the national legislature and crafting laws.

name: Governor
description: Heads the state government, ensuring policies are implemented at the regional level.

name: Minister of Health
description: Oversees national healthcare programs, hospitals, and public health initiatives.

name: Minister of Education
description: Responsible for schools, universities, and national education standards.

name: President
description: Serves as the head of state and commander-in-chief, guiding the nation’s vision.

name: Vice President
description: Supports the president and often presides over the legislative chamber.

name: Mayor
description: Leads a city’s administration and ensures community development.

name: Ambassador
description: Represents the country’s interests abroad and fosters diplomatic relations.

name: Prime Minister
description: Heads the government and directs national policy and administration.

name: Secretary of Defense
description: Manages the nation’s military forces and defense strategies.

name: Chief Justice
description: Leads the judiciary and ensures laws are interpreted fairly.

name: Member of Parliament
description: Represents a constituency in parliament and participates in lawmaking.

name: Minister of Finance
description: Oversees national budgets, taxation, and economic policy.

name: Cabinet Secretary
description: Supports executive functions and coordinates between ministries.

name: Councilor
description: Represents a local district or ward within municipal councils.

name: Senate Majority Leader
description: Coordinates legislative priorities and leads the majority party in the senate.

name: Minister of Environment
description: Responsible for policies on climate, conservation, and natural resources.

name: Attorney General
description: Acts as the chief legal advisor to the government and enforces laws.

name: Speaker of the House
description: Presides over the lower chamber of the legislature and maintains order.

name: National Security Advisor
description: Advises the head of state on matters of security and foreign policy.
